item.title: Mustard Vinaigrette
item.description: Ingredients 1/2 cup white vinegar 1 tablespoon honey 1 tablespoon prepared Dijon-style mustard 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper 2 teaspoons salt 2 teaspoons minced garlic 1 cup vegetable oil 4 drops hot sauce Directions In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, honey, mustard, pepper, salt, garlic, oil and hot sauce until thoroughly combined. Chill until serving.
